name: HFMarkDownRender
summary: A professional iOS Markdown rendering framework for AI conversation apps
description:
HFMarkDownRender is a professional iOS Markdown rendering framework,
designed for AI conversation apps like ChatGPT / Doubao / Manus.

Features:
- Support for basic Markdown elements (paragraphs, headings, lists, quotes, code blocks, tables)
- Streaming support for real-time LLM output
- Customizable rendering with UICollectionView
- AST-based parsing architecture
- Performance optimized with height caching and cell reuse
